00211 class OPENMM_EXPORT CustomIntegrator : public Integrator {
00212 public:
00216     enum ComputationType {
00220         ComputeGlobal = 0,
00224         ComputePerDof = 1,
00228         ComputeSum = 2,
00232         ConstrainPositions = 3,
00236         ConstrainVelocities = 4,
00240         UpdateContextState = 5
00241     };
00247     CustomIntegrator(double stepSize);
00251     int getNumGlobalVariables() const {
00252         return globalNames.size();
00253     }
00257     int getNumPerDofVariables() const {
00258         return perDofNames.size();
00259     }

00264         return computations.size();
00265     }

00349     int addComputeGlobal(const std::string& variable, const std::string& expression);

00422         return randomNumberSeed;

00433         randomNumberSeed = seed;
00434     }
